lyrics:
48 contributorsgravity lyricschorus

dream of ways to throw it all away

repeat verse 2

and cant sustain like one half could
its wanting more thats gonna send me to my knees

woah woah
gravity stay the hell away from me
woah woah

now how can that be

outro
just keep me where the light is
just keep me where the light is
just keep me where the light is
come on keep me where the light is
come on keep me where the light is
come on keep me where now keep me where the light is58embed
